    • setHighlighter

      public void setHighlighter​(Highlighter hl)
      Sets a Highlighter
      Parameters:
      hl - the Highlighter

    • highlight

      public void highlight()
      Highlights text elements in the entire text

    • highlight

      public void highlight​(int chgPos, boolean isNewline)
      Highlights text elements in a section around the position where a change happened. The section is initially the line that contains chgPos or the two lines around this position if isNewline is true.
      Parameters:
      chgPos - the position where a change happened
      isNewline - if the change is a newline

    • highlight

      public void highlight​(java.lang.String change, int chgPos)
      Highlights text elements in a section that may be multiline. The section initially consists of the completed lines that contain change and it begins with the line that contains chgPos.
      Parameters:
      change - the change to the text
      chgPos - the position where the change starts
